You need to spend alot of time to know the maps and location while also having to deal with teammates who mostly play on their own and don't give a damn about teamplay. Funnily enough they are really good at blaming others for their mistakes and always know better. This creates huge toxicity. Often enough you encounter smurfs leaving the game with a K/D of 3.0 and above. 
I don't recommend wasting time on this game
If you like sitting and holding an angle with an AWP for 20 years then here's the perfect game for you
